mainText:
Apple folks,

Deaths rarely move me to tears, yet this death... so many of my passions have been made accessible because Steve Jobs chose to dream, create then share. 

I think this is worth sheding a tear.

Forgive me, if I shed more than one.

I don't know if my world is better, but it is so much cooler!

Steve, thank you, godspeed and may your family, friends, co-workers and employees know the peace that only time can bring. 

You thought differently and changed the world.
header: So long and thanks for all the fish.
author: Dean
